titles.title: A resolution designating September 30, 2022, as "Mississippi National Guard Recognition Day".
A resolution designating September 30, 2022, as "Mississippi National Guard Recognition Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution designates September 30, 2022, as Mississippi National Guard Recognition Day and recognizes the efforts of the Mississippi National Guard 60 years ago to maintain peace in Oxford, Mississippi, during the largest deployment of troops to a single disturbance in the history of the Mississippi National Guard.
